intro.title: Volunteer Registration
intro.description: Thank you for your interest in volunteering with our organization. Your time and talents can make a real difference in our community. Please complete this form to help us match you with the most suitable volunteer opportunities.

volunteer_agreement.title: Volunteer Agreement
volunteer_agreement.description: I agree to abide by the policies, procedures, and guidelines of the organization during my volunteer service. I understand that I am not an employee and will not receive compensation for my volunteer work.

confidentiality_agreement.title: Confidentiality Agreement
confidentiality_agreement.description: I agree to maintain the confidentiality of all proprietary or privileged information to which I am exposed while serving as a volunteer, whether this information involves staff, volunteers, clients, or overall organization business.

photo_release.title: Photo Release
photo_release.description: I grant permission for the organization to use photographs or videos of me taken during volunteer activities for promotional purposes, including but not limited to websites, social media, brochures, and other marketing materials.

liability_release.title: Liability Release
liability_release.description: I release, discharge, and hold harmless the organization and its successors from any and all liability, claims, and demands which arise or may hereafter arise from my volunteer work. I understand that this release discharges the organization from any liability or claim with respect to bodily injury, personal injury, illness, death, or property damage that may result from my volunteer activities.

information_accuracy.title: Information Accuracy
information_accuracy.description: I certify that the information provided in this application is true, complete, and correct to the best of my knowledge. I understand that any false statements or omissions may disqualify me from further consideration as a volunteer and may result in my dismissal if discovered at a later date.

signature.title: Digital Signature
signature.description: Please type your full name as your digital signature

parent_guardian_signature.title: Parent/Guardian Signature
parent_guardian_signature.description: If under 18, please have a parent or guardian type their full name as their digital signature

additional_comments.title: Additional Comments
additional_comments.description: Please provide any additional information or questions you may have

thank_you.title: Thank You!
thank_you.description: Thank you for your interest in volunteering with our organization. We appreciate your willingness to share your time and talents. A volunteer coordinator will contact you within 5-7 business days to discuss next steps. If you have any questions in the meantime, please contact our volunteer office.
